section.name: Using Hippo ECM
section.p: Hippo ECM provides a number of functionalities "out of the box". This section describes how to make use of those functionalities.

Hippo Repository is built on top of Apache Jackrabbit. Hippo Repository adds extra functionality to the default Jackrabbit distribution while keeping full compliance with JCR 1.0 JSR 170. The main added features are virtual nodes based on facets (metadata), access management, authorization and workflow.

Combining facet selects and facet searches gives you an enormeous flexibility in exposing your data in endless possible ways. Every user could have her own desirable view of the data, obviously automatically combined with their access rules!

ul.li: Facet search - Browse your content through multiple navigation paths based on meta information
Facet select - Browse your content through a filter based on metadata (e.g. language)
Workflow - Define and automate business rules for your documents
